title: Learn more about the interpretation of eating chicken in a dream from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of eating chicken in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of eating chicken in a dream and every part of it. Seeing chicks in a dream is one of the visions that many people may experience, and which have many interpretations, which differ between good and evil, and therefore we will learn about the best interpretations that appeared for seeing chicken in a dream and eating it. Such as the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi, and many scholars. Interpretation of eating chicken in a dream for a man: If one sees cooked and fried chicken in a dream and eats it, this means that the dreamer will obtain a new job or a high position and status, or that he will benefit from his trade in the future, or that he has a project, by God. The highest and most knowledgeable. In particular, when he eats the groin area, this indicates the kindness of his wife’s heart, and it is also said that it is an indication that the dreamer will be blessed with good offspring. If it is roasted during his sleep, this is a sign that he will obtain a lot of money, but after her fatigue, They also said that he will have a very tiring job. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about eating chicken: If he sees that he is eating the legs, this is an indication that the dreamer will face many problems in the future. reality, which is difficult to solve. Seeing him eating her breast is very desirable in dreams, as this indicates that he will receive food and benefit, and it also indicates that he is able to pay off his debts and get rid of his troubles, and God Almighty - knows best. As for eating the head, it is It is not good, and it may indicate the end of the guardianship of someone close to the dreamer, whether it is his mother or his wife. Interpretation of eating chicken in a dream for a single woman: If she ate it in her dream, and it was delicious, this indicates the imminence of her marriage or engagement, and she is also relieved of worries and is evidence of following a system. Great nutritional value. But if it was raw and she ate it, this indicates that she was stabbing someone in the back and speaking ill of him, and she also said that something bad would happen to her in the future. Interpretation of eating chicken in a dream for a married woman: If she ate it greedily, and it was raw, then this is a sign that He will face many problems and fears in the near future. If it is boiled, it means stability for her and a happy life filled with calm and peace. If she eats its head, then this is parting with someone close to the dreamer, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Sources:- 1- The Book of Selected Words in the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad ibn Sirin, Dar Al-Ma’rifa, Beirut 2000. 2- Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi. Al Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008. 3- The book “The Perfume of Dreams in Expressing a Dream,” by Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi. The religion of Khalil bin Shaheen Al-Dhaheri, researched by Sayyed Kasravi Hassan, Dar Al-Kutub Publishing House, Beirut 1993.

title: Explain why the atomic emission spectrum contains certain frequencies of light

preview.html: Explain why the emission spectrum Atomic emission spectrum contains certain frequencies of light is a general question in secondary chemistry and your future career is related to excellence in chemistry. These colors did not change for a single element, and this was considered the signature of the element, but the reason is unknown. Explain why the emission spectrum has the higher the energy of an electron, the farther away from the nucleus its orbit is. Each electron has a certain energy level.Explain why the atomic emission spectrum contains certain frequencies of lightExplain why the emission spectrum contains theDirect answer: Since the energies of atoms are finite, so only certain frequencies are emitted from the radiation emitted by the atom, But to fully understand the answer, you must know the following: Explain why the emission spectrum, after the heating process of a pure element, contains the excitation of its electrons, and electromagnetic waves are produced by this process, and the atomic emission is the relative intensity that characterizes the resulting waves. It contains the atomic emission spectrum . What distinguishes the atomic emission spectrum is the ability to distinguish elements from it, as no two chemical elements have the same spectrum, so by measuring the sun’s spectrometer for example, we conclude that it consists of helium and hydrogen. Therefore, the answer to a question explaining why the atomic emission spectrum contains frequencies A certain type of light according to Bohr's atomic model is: Since the energy of an atom of a particular element is known and determined, certain frequencies of radiation are emitted from it. For further clarification, follow us for the rest of the article. Bohr's atomic model. Explain why the emission spectrum is contained, for the scientist Niels Bohr, who proposed this model To represent the internal structure of the atom, his model relies on the interpretation of the spectral lines emitted by the hydrogen atom, and in the following steps we explain the most important features of Bohr’s model: Scientists noticed in the late nineteenth century that when the energy of the atoms of a particular element increases, they radiate specific bright colors and that these colors did not change for any particular element. It was considered a fingerprint of the element, but the reason why was not known. For example, if we pass an electric current through hydrogen gas (H2), the hydrogen will split into atoms (H), and we will see with the naked eye that it emits a distinctive light of one color, while if we pass the resulting The resulting light output through a glass prism, will be split into 4 colors using a wavelength finder and whenever we repeat the experiment, we get the same result. Explain why the emission spectrum contains the atomic spectrum, then, since it is the specific colors that are emitted as a result of the excitation of the pure element. Explain why Emission spectrum containment By 1913, Niels Bohr used Rutherford's atomic model, which showed that the atom consisted of negative electrons orbiting a positively charged nucleus. In explaining the frequency emitted by the hydrogen atom. Bohr's explanation was the key to understanding the movement of electrons around the hydrogen nucleus. In Bohr's model, it is shown that: Electrons revolve around the nucleus of the atom

It was considered a fingerprint of the element, but the reason why was not known. For example, if we pass an electric current through hydrogen gas (H2), the hydrogen will split into atoms (H), and we will see with the naked eye that it emits a distinctive light of one color, while if we pass the resulting The resulting light output through a glass prism, will be split into 4 colors using a wavelength finder and whenever we repeat the experiment, we get the same result. Explain why the emission spectrum contains the atomic spectrum, then, since it is the specific colors that are emitted as a result of the excitation of the pure element. Explain why Emission spectrum containment By 1913, Niels Bohr used Rutherford's atomic model, which showed that the atom consisted of negative electrons orbiting a positively charged nucleus. In explaining the frequency emitted by the hydrogen atom. Bohr's explanation was the key to understanding the movement of electrons around the hydrogen nucleus. In Bohr's model, it is shown that: Electrons revolve around the nucleus of the atom

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing birds in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing birds in a dream: Seeing birds in a dream shows a great man with prestige and power, and seeing birds shows a beautiful woman, and birds in a dream have many different meanings and meanings in reality, as many people do. You prefer raising birds, including colorful birds or birds that contain many beautiful species. We will list many interpretations related to the interpretation of the dream of seeing birds in a dream. Follow us. Interpretation of the dream of seeing birds by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that he saw a man eating bird meat or plucking their feathers. , indicating that the dreamer takes lawful money. If the dreamer sees that he is trapping a bird and it flies away in the dream, this indicates the death of his son. As for the dreamer who sees a bird coming out of his mouth, this indicates that he is an impostor and a deceiver. Also, seeing the bird entering the dreamer’s mouth is evidence of That the dreamer falls into torment and darkness. The dreamer who sees himself owning many birds, imprisoning them, and torturing them shows how cruelly he, his family, and his children are treated. Seeing birds singing in a dream means love and affection between family and friends. Interpretation of a dream about seeing birds for a single woman. If one sees a bird in his dream, this It means that there are many problems that you cannot solve and it appears that they have a lot of money that they spend on trivial matters. And if an unmarried woman dreams of slaughtering a bird, this indicates that she will marry a man of weak character and give birth to a frightened child. In addition to single people who see a bird In a dream, interpreted by interpreters, they indicate that she is a pure, lively and ambitious girl. As for seeing the sound and song of a bird, it is evidence of good treatment and good speech in reality. An unmarried woman carrying a bird in a dream is evidence of her marriage to a very generous man who has a lot of money. If You saw that you are eating a bird, this indicates that you will get a lot of money and a lot of goodness and you will also get the husband you want. Searching for a bird is a sign of a near death. Interpretation of a dream about seeing birds for a married woman. Seeing a bird in a dream is evidence of upcoming disputes between her and her husband, but This will disappear after a short time. As for seeing a bird attacking a married woman, this indicates that she will meet someone who has been missing for a long time. A married woman who sees herself eating bird meat indicates that she has a lot of money and stability in her married life. As for seeing white birds In a dream for a married woman, this indicates that she is pure and chaste. Seeing a bird falling into the hand of a married woman is evidence that she will receive a lot of money and this also indicates that something bad will happen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing birds for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who sees birds indicates the birth of a child A beautiful male. As for a pregnant woman who sees a bird in a dream, this indicates that a girl will be born and she will be in good condition. A pregnant woman eats bird meat. Because it announces to them a lot of money. A black bird in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will face some problems in her life, but she will get rid of them. Interpretation of a dream about a bird

title: Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman whose husband divorced her

preview.html: Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream that her husband divorced her in a dream. Through the following lines, we will show you the meaning of seeing divorce for a pregnant woman in a dream and what it indicates. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream that her husband divorced her in a dream. When a pregnant woman sees her divorce from her husband in a dream, this indicates the renewal of the relationship between her and her husband. The divorce of a pregnant woman can also indicate the husband’s love for the woman. The husband’s divorce from his pregnant wife indicates the disappearance of the health problems that the woman suffers from. It can also indicate that the woman will overcome the difficult pain of childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman hitting her sister in a dream. When a pregnant woman dreams of hitting her sister, this indicates the benefit that her sister gets. Likewise, when she sees a sister being beaten With a stick in a dream, this indicates kindness and love. Likewise, hitting a pregnant sister can mean a woman’s attention and care. Also, a pregnant woman being beaten by her sister may indicate a breakdown in problems and differences between her and her sister. Interpretation of dreams for a pregnant woman hitting her mother in a dream. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is hitting her mother If a snake is alive, this indicates her kindness to the mother. It can also indicate the benefit that the woman gives to the mother, as it can show the daughter’s concern for the mother. When he saw the deceased mother being beaten, it appeared that he remembered to ask for forgiveness and pray after death. It may be a sign that the woman will give the mother some work. The righteous interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman hitting her father in a dream. If a pregnant woman sees that she is hitting her father, this means that she is taking care of her father and taking care of him. A paternal stroke also indicates care and attention. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is hitting a dead father, this means that she is calling him. It also indicates that the wife reminds the father to pray. And zakat. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of slaughtering a sheep in a dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that slaughtering a pregnant sheep in a dream could indicate the gender of the boy. However, if a pregnant woman dreams that she is slaughtering a sheep, this indicates that she will give birth to a male, God willing. It can also indicate the birth of a child who is righteous to his parents and is distinguished. With piety and faith, slaughtering a sheep and eating it raw in a dream indicates a woman’s backbiting and backbiting. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream of her tooth being extracted in a dream. When a pregnant woman sees a broken tooth in a dream, this is an indication that the woman may have a lot to live on, and it may indicate the birth of a male child, God willing. Also, it can indicate removing A pregnant woman's molar tooth indicates the elimination of fears and problems. It can also indicate the woman's due date is approaching. Interpretation of a pregnant woman's dream in a dream with bread. Scientists have shown that bread in a dream indicates money and children. Therefore, when a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is baking bread, this means that she will get a lot of food. Also, seeing a pregnant woman’s bread may indicate that the due date is approaching. It may also indicate that the woman is characterized by intelligence and awareness in her professional and personal life. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream that she is sleeping on the street in a dream. If the woman sees...

title: Interpretation of dreams about someone I know ignoring me

preview.html: The meaning of seeing someone I love ignoring me in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. In fact, the interpretation of seeing someone I know and love ignoring me in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many problems and crises in his life in the coming period, and God is Most High. If you see your lover ignoring you in a dream, this indicates problems between the two sides and shows Also imaginary feelings between them. Interpretation of seeing someone I know ignoring me in a single woman’s dream. Ibn Sirin explains that an unmarried girl who sees that her lover is ignoring her when he sees her. However, she should be careful of this person because he is hiding a lot of imaginary feelings for her. This dream also shows that there are One-sided feelings in this relationship and these feelings are latent from the single girl. In the event that an unmarried girl dreams that someone loves him and sees him and ignores her, however, he needs to reconsider this relationship because it is possible that this person does not arouse the same feelings. In fact, it is interpreted to see Ignoring a lover in a dream by an unmarried girl also feels severe psychological pressure and emotional pressure. Ibn Sirin explains that seeing a single girl whom he knows and loves and seeing her and ignoring her means that he will enter into a love relationship with someone, but it will not be successful and they will separate. If a girl sees such a dream, this is interpreted As thinking about this person and wanting to be associated with him, but not having the audacity and courage to reveal such a decision. Interpretation of dreams that I am ignoring someone I know It is important to emphasize that a person’s dream is that he is ignoring people he knows when he sees them. This is evidence that the dreamer will face many problems And problems and obstacles, so he must be careful. Being ignored in a dream is interpreted by many interpreters as an unpleasant vision and indicates the coming of sadness and anxiety. However, we must know that seeing an unfaithful person being ignored in a dream is one of the good interpretations. Until the problems end and the dreamer’s worries collapse, by God’s command. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of dreams to see someone I do not know looking at me. Interpretation that someone is not paying attention to you in a dream. In the event that someone dreams that there is someone who loves him and does not care about him or care for him. This indicates the emergence of problems between them, And the big disagreements and harmful things that the dreamer is exposed to. Interpretation of seeing someone I know ignoring me in a dream about a married woman. Even seeing a married woman being ignored by someone is exposed during this period to more psychological and physical pressure. It is important to know that when a married woman sees that there is someone who loves her but does not care In it, it is evidence of the presence and mixing of feelings of sadness and weakness towards this lady. It is interpreted that a married woman sees that her husband is ignoring her in a dream about the presence of deceptive feelings for the lady, so he judges things logically, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. The interpretation of seeing someone I know ignoring me in a dream about a man and its meanings is seen by many interpreters. A man sees that his girlfriend is ignoring him in a dream. However, this woman does not feel love or admiration for the man and that she does not want him in her life and must stay away from her. It is important that

title: Interpretation of a dream about an exam and seeing success in a dream denotes failure and is not solvable

preview.html: Learn with us the interpretation of a dream about an examination in a dream by leading scholars and dream interpreters. Interpretation of the dream according to Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation that seeing an examination in a dream indicates goodness and livelihood, and it also indicates an examination and examination from God Almighty to His servant. Whoever sees in his dream He is taking an exam and cannot answer, then this dream indicates that he is stumbling in the affairs of his life. Whoever dreams that his exam paper is black, this dream indicates difficult days full of troubles. And whoever sees in a dream that he failed the exam, this dream indicates kindness, food, and money that he will receive. He will come to him in the coming days. Search for your dream in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of dreams according to the Arabic alphabet. Dream of success: Whoever dreams that he is taking an exam and passes it and succeeds, then this dream indicates that he will pass the exam and will be exposed to it. Whoever dreams that he will pass exams and be happy and happy, then this dream indicates that he is close to marriage. Interpretation of the dream of the Nabulsi exam: Al-Nabulsi says in his interpretation that he sees the exam in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is taking an exam and is unable to answer, then this dream indicates that he will be exposed to some problems in the affairs of his life or will befall him. And whoever sees in his dream that he is taking an exam and cannot He can answer, as this dream indicates his distance from God and his lack of worship, so the one who has it should repent and return to God. And whoever sees in a dream that he was taking an exam and passed it and succeeded, then this dream shows the strength of patience in worldly matters and the ability to endure it in calamities. Examination in a dream For unmarried people: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she failed an exam, then this dream indicates her success and success in life and work. If she sees that she has passed the exams, then this dream is good news that she will get married soon. But if she sees that she is in an exam hall and cannot answer, then This dream shows some of the problems that she faces in her life. Interpretation of a dream about exams for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is taking an exam and she passes, then this dream indicates an imminent pregnancy. But if she sees that she is taking an exam and fails, then this dream indicates her success in her life. And her stability in her home. And if she sees that she is taking an exam and she cannot solve it or stumbles in the answer, then this dream indicates that she will be exposed to some problems in her family life. Interpretation of a dream about examination for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she will pass exams, then this dream indicates ease Her position and the ease of placing them. But if she sees that she failed the exams, then this dream shows some of the problems that she will face during her birth. See also: Interpretation of the dream of failing in the exams. The symbol of eggs in a dream. What does it mean to see eggs? See also the video Interpretation of the dream of exams and the lack of a solution. We provide you with an interpretation of the vision Examination in a dream by leading scholars and dream interpreters. You can comment on the interpretation of your dreams and we will respond directly with greetings from the site for dreams.

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting long hair in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about cutting long hair in a dream for a single woman indicates a group of interpretations that depend on the signs of the dream and can be summarized as follows: When an unmarried woman sees that she is cutting her long hair, this indicates that there are some things that worry her. On her, the dream carries a message of thinking and dealing with difficulties. She may appear sick, but she will recover soon. While an unmarried woman dreamed of cutting her long hair in a dream, she was happy, and her hair became attractive, which indicates that her condition improved for the better. While an unmarried woman dreamed of someone Her hair being cut is an expression of what she will get in the coming periods of change in her life from her connection to a pious person. It can symbolize success on the academic or professional level. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for single women. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair and throwing it in the toilet in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream Cutting hair and throwing it into the toilet in a dream for a married woman can express some unwanted signs, which can be listed as follows: Seeing a married woman cutting her hair and throwing it into the toilet in a dream indicates problems surrounding her marital life. It symbolizes his inability to get rid of It is possible only by going through many obstacles. As for a married woman’s sadness in a dream about shortening her hair, this indicates that she will be exposed to some crises in her life. Or she may express her sadness over her death and her advancement. On the other hand, we find that cutting a married woman’s hair in A dream, accompanied by joy and an attractive hair shape, indicates the happiness that she seeks in her coming days. Taking into account that the interpretation of a married woman’s haircut depends on the way she cuts it, while natural cutting with scissors, it is one of the promising visions. But cutting it by pulling it and cutting it by hand It is a sign of your problems and a sign of bad news. While a married woman’s dream of her husband cutting her hair is an expression of the crises and problems she faces in her married life, which may lead to separation and divorce. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a pregnant woman’s hair falls within the framework of visions. A praiseworthy dream that heralds the coming of goodness, which can have the following interpretations: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is cutting her hair, this indicates the end of the difficulties and pain of pregnancy and an easy birth. Also, seeing a pregnant woman cutting her hair in large quantities until it becomes very short is evidence that she She will give birth to a boy of piety and righteousness who will be fair to his parents. As for the appearance of hair in an attractive appearance after cutting it in a pregnant woman’s dream, this indicates that she will be blessed with a beautiful baby girl in terms of form and content. While the appearance of the husband cutting his pregnant wife’s hair in a dream indicates the death of worries and problems with The arrival of the new baby and their lives change for the better. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair in a dream for a divorced woman. The vision of cutting hair in a dream for a divorced woman carries a set of interpretations that...

title: Interpretation of the meaning of scissors in a dream: Seeing yourself cutting clothes in a dream

preview.html: Seeing scissors for single, married, pregnant, and divorced women, large, small, and open, nail scissors, cutting cloth or clothes, and more for the faithful scissors. Scissors are one of the things that are used for many things in life. It is used for cutting and detailing clothes. There are types used in the kitchen and for cutting vegetables and meat. Some interpretive scholars have stated that scissors in a dream are evidence of a husband and wife and the quarrel that will occur between them in life. Interpretation of a dream about scissors by Ibn Sirin. Scissors may indicate the presence of certain observations from certain parties regarding the work of the dreamer as a supervisor in a survey, for example, and it may indicate Divorcing a woman, and it may indicate a solution to a problem. Seeing scissors in a dream means cutting off symptoms, because one of her names is cut off. Perhaps it indicates the guardian of the difference between right and wrong. Scissors in a dream indicate an increase in slaves and children, as well as a brother, sister, and beast. If he has someone who benefits others, unless he is not married, he will be expelled from the family. He saw that a sting had descended on him from the sky, his life ended and he disappeared. He who peeled people’s beards or their clothes with scissors, so he followed them and betrayed them. He said: The scissors indicate two acceptable partners. It was said: Whoever sees him with his hand is a brother from his mother, and whoever sees him with his hand cutting hair or wool, he will collect a lot of money. It was said: The one who is destined is a man who improves people. The creditor: Anyone who sees that he was given a pair of scissors, cut them, owned them, or bought them. If he has a son, another will come to him, and if he has a daughter, another will come to him, as well as a brother, sister, and relatives. If he has a monster, he will strike people like him, and so on in everything. Whoever dreams that he cuts wool, hair, or Hair, then he collects money with his hair, words, astrology, or a knife. Whoever dreams of cutting his hair with scissors, nails, or clothes, this is evidence of kindness. Whoever dreams that he has scissors in his hand, or someone gave them to him, or bought scissors, and if he has a son: a son like him. If he has a daughter, then he will give him a daughter like her, and if he does not have a wife or son, then God Almighty will give him another brother. Whoever dreams of cutting scissors into two pieces, then the decision is the same. Whoever sees that someone gave him scissors if he has a horse, he will raise another horse, and if he has A house, then he will get another house for him, and all his food will be for himself. Whoever sees his scissors broken, or sees a pair of broken scissors, his interpretation differs from what was mentioned, and it was said: The scissors are interpreted as scissors, and perhaps he was a reconciliator among people. It is said: Whoever saw a pair of forceps in his hand and did not He cuts it, and he has a dispute before the judge. It was said: Perhaps the scissors refer to someone who separates reunification and walks with a break in intimacy when the proverb is between a needle and scissors. Scissors said in the tongue of the needle, the thing that I value is a great honor, and I offer it, and your value is small and you rise above the head.In general, seeing scissors is interpreted in two waysOther meanings of the symbol of the appearance of scissors in a dreamScissors in a dream indicate a guardian or a separator between right and wrong.Seeing Scissors descending from the sky indicate the end and end of life. Seeing people cutting their beards and clothes in a dream means committing injustice and betrayal. Seeing yourself cutting hair or wool with scissors means that you will collect a lot of money. Seeing the use of scissors means...

title: Interpretation of a fishing net in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a fishing net in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing fishing is one of the visions that many people see in their dreams, and many people are searching for an interpretation of this dream, which carries many different interpretations and connotations, but what about seeing the fishing net itself in a dream, which the world explained to us? The great Ibn Sirin, and we will learn about the interpretation of this vision in detail through this article in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of a fishing net in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Dream interpretation scholars say that if one sees a fish in a fishing net in his dream, this means that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money and wealth. In the coming period, but if he sees in his dream that he is fishing but there are no scales in it, this indicates that the person he sees is practicing many wrong behaviors. But if one sees in a dream that he is catching a large fish through a fishing net, this means that the dreamer will get You will get a lot of money and great spoils after many projects, and the larger the size and number of fish, the greater the number. Of fish, wealth increases. But if someone in his life eats fish like the road, this indicates that he has many maids and women in his life. If a man sees in his dream that he is catching a big and a small fish together in a net, then this vision shows that things It is mixed with the dreamer and that sorrows and joys overlap, but if the largest fish is the largest, then this indicates that joy is more than sadness and vice versa. Interpretation of seeing fishing in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in a dream that he has caught a group of Dead fish in a net, this means that what a person wants in his life he will not be able to get, but if he sees that he is fishing from his hands, this indicates that it will benefit her quickly. But if a person sees in his dream that he is fishing from salt water and then puts it in fresh water, This means that the seer is a hypocritical person or that he is suffering from deception and hypocrisy from the people around him, but if he takes him from fresh water to fresh water, this indicates that the seer is a person loyal to his friends. But if one returns the fish to the water after catching it, then this vision It indicates that the dreamer will abandon a great sin he was committing, or that he will achieve a great goal that he is pursuing. Interpretation of the vision of fishing from the water by Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen says: If a person sees in his dream that he is fishing from cloudy water, this means that this person performs many deeds that do not There is no good or blessing in it, but if he sees that he is hunting a small group. Fish, it indicates the loss of grace in the person’s hand. If a person sees in his dream that he is catching four fish, this means that this person will marry four women. If the number of fish is unknown, this indicates a lot of food and money, but if a man sees in a dream If a person sees in his dream that he is catching a large fish from the water or a river and taking it as he pleases, this indicates that the dreamer

title: Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream, and it is one of the visions narrated by dreamers. This is because watermelon is one of the delicious fruits that has many praiseworthy connotations. We will try to identify it in this article about the most famous dream interpretation scholars such as the scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin, but before we start looking at watermelon in a dream, We must emphasize that the dream interpretations we provide are specific to the vision that the dreamer saw, and this interpretation cannot be deduced for any other vision except after asking a question to one of the trusted interpreters of dreams in forensic science, especially since the interpretation of dreams is a fatwa that requires a specialized scientist. See also: The toilet In a dream. Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream. An unmarried girl who sees watermelon in a dream. This may be a bad sign that girls will get married late, and God knows best. Just like an unmarried girl who sees in a dream eating watermelon, it may be from Among the human race, the girl will get married soon - God willing. As for the single girl who sees a large watermelon in a dream, this may indicate that this girl is facing some health problems, God forbid. See also: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing watermelon in a dream for a married woman Married woman sees Watermelon in a dream, this may be a person. This woman will enjoy good humility - God willing. As for seeing a watermelon in a dream for a married woman, this may indicate that this woman will become pregnant soon. Also, watermelon in general in a married woman’s dream may indicate the enormous wealth that the woman will enjoy - God willing. - Soon. Seeing watermelon in a man’s dream. An unmarried man who sees in his dream that he is eating watermelon indicates that this may be someone for him who will get married soon - God willing. Just like watermelon when eaten in a dream, this generally foretells for the person happy events that He will get it during the coming period - God willing -. In addition, eating delicious watermelon in a dream at the end indicates the stability of the life that the dreamer lives - God willing - Penguin in a dream Seeing watermelon in a dream If the dreamer is the person who is building his new project, whether A wedding project or a business project, seeing watermelon in a dream can be a sign of success in this project. Also, watermelon in a dream can indicate that milk is one of the wise figures who will be able to obtain a rich livelihood - God willing. Just like When you buy watermelon in a dream, this could be one of the signs that the dreamer has the ability to take risks. Seeing green watermelon in a dream When you dream of green watermelon in a dream, this may be one of the signs that the dreamer is a healthy person - God willing - or that he He will recover from an illness, and God knows best. There are also many dream interpreters who see that green watermelon in a dream indicates a child or a husband. A married woman sees green watermelon in a dream, this may be...
